=*Add the Google Calendar Gadget*= _(easy)_
  # Add the gadget to your calendar:
    [https://www.google.com/calendar/render?gadgeturl=https://my-episodes-2-ical.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/myepisodes2ical.xml https://my-episodes-2-ical.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/addToGC.gif]
  # Enter your MyEpisodes.com username, and md5-password`**`
  # It will then display the MyEpisodes 'MyList' feed of your shows in a clean gadget UI within Google Calendar.
    * Other feeds to choose from: MyList, Today, Tomorrow, Unwatched, Unacquired


`**` Your MD5 password is NOT your normal password. To find your MD5 password, return to MyEpisodes.com. Log in and go to the [http://www.myepisodes.com/cp.php MyEpisodes.com Control Panel]. Copy your MD5 hashed password and paste it into the form.
